Articles.Content: IS there a mod out there that will let me access the science Archives from the R&D building?  It's a pain to have to switch between flight/tracking views and back to the R&D building to find a LZ on a planet/moon that I haven't done science on yet.

Probably most people are using [x]Science for that. You can show a list of all completed science, though it’s simpler to work directly with the list of undone available science. If that feels too cheaty you’d have to simply not look I think

7 hours ago, fourfa said:

Probably most people are using [x]Science for that. You can show a list of all completed science, though it’s simpler to work directly with the list of undone available science. If that feels too cheaty you’d have to simply not look I think 

Well considering I'm using ForScience! also, I don't think I will feel too bad about it.   Thank you. 

I'm outa rep for the day, so if anybody could kindly throw some his way for me, I'd be grateful. 

Edited April 1, 2018 by Gargamel
